attributes.action: DELAY OR REVIEW IR35 AGAIN.AS PEOPLE WILL LOSE 40% OF WAGES
attributes.additional_details: Please review ir35 as this may ruin a lot of lifes.As from 6th of aprill we as ltd drivers work for agency will earn drasticcly less and its no like 10% lest its nearly 30-40%less a week which is huge impact
attributes.background: Please review ir35 as this will ruin my and others life

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300458.
